name: the dream is always the same
description:
The dream is always the same
There are ghosts
And the ghosts are all mine
I am running from them, I can’t see them but I hear their footsteps
When I look back, they are young and more beautiful than any living thing
They are laughing and waving at me as if to say “look how far you have come!”
But their voices make no sound
It is then I realize that I am in the same dream
and wonder if I get to wake up this time.
